title: Small factorials
text:
You are asked to calculate factorials of some small positive integers.InputAn integer t, 1 ≤ t ≤ 100, denoting the number of testcases, followed by t lines, each containing a single integer n, 1 ≤ n ≤ 100.OutputFor each integer n given at input, display a line with the value of n!ExampleInput:4
1
2
5
3Output:1
2
120
6
